title: What are the hardest words for a kid aged 14 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: Alright this is real hard question! If you mean to pronounce.. Nah there is nothing that cant be pronounced. If you mean some words that would make them feel guilty. It depends on bringing up, mostly they are in the gae where they have their own views on the world, any thing you say against their views will offend them. Try being sarcastic funny, or advice them what they want to hear, let them do their mistakes and learn from them. Always be so coll that they want to share their secrets with you, do not judge or react on the secrets, be cool and help him understand the problem in it himself without your words.
